summary: The diff primarily adds production deployment/smoke-test documentation, but it also includes a backend code modification despite the request to deploy the already-approved Draft Version 36 without further code changes. There is no evidence in the diff of an actual production canister upgrade being executed or a smoke test being performed (only checklists/scripts were added).

missing_requirements.requirement: Deploy the current approved build (Draft Version 36) to production as an Internet Computer canister upgrade, without making further feature/code changes.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff contains documentation for deployment, but no evidence of a production canister upgrade being performed (e.g., release/deploy configuration changes, CI/CD changes, or recorded deployment outcome). Also, the backend code was modified, which conflicts with the requirement to deploy without further code changes.

missing_requirements.requirement: After production deployment, perform a basic smoke test of Internet Identity login/logout and user profile persistence across refresh/relogin.
missing_requirements.reason: A smoke test script/checklist was added, but there is no evidence the smoke test was actually executed or that results were recorded (no logs/results/verification artifacts in the diff).

hallucinated_features.description: Backend code changes in backend/main.mo (implementation changes beyond deployment documentation).
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest explicitly states to deploy the approved Draft Version 36 without making further feature/code changes; modifying backend code is out of scope for a pure deployment promotion.

hallucinated_features.description: Project tracking/state update marking deployment/smoke-test items as 'pending' in project_state.json.
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest asks to deploy and then smoke test; adding/altering internal tracking metadata was not requested as part of the deployment deliverable.
